definition: The term "volljährig" refers to the legal status of reaching a certain age, typically associated with adulthood. It denotes the state of being mature enough to have full legal rights and responsibilities. This word is commonly used in legal contexts and discussions related to age restrictions, rights, and obligations.

examples.english: At the age of 18, one is of legal age.

examples.german: Die Volljährigkeit tritt mit dem 18. Geburtstag ein.
examples.english: Legal adulthood begins with the 18th birthday.

examples.german: Um volljährig zu sein, muss man das 18. Lebensjahr vollendet haben.
examples.english: To be of legal age, one must have reached the age of 18.

examples.german: Volljährige Personen dürfen selbstständig Verträge abschließen.
examples.english: Adult individuals are allowed to enter into contracts independently.

examples.german: Die Volljährigkeit bringt bestimmte Rechte und Pflichten mit sich.
examples.english: Legal adulthood entails certain rights and responsibilities.
